original_text: So David said, “Look, tomorrow is the New Moon feast, and I am supposed to dine with the king; but let me go and hide in the field until the evening of the day after tomorrow.
korean_text: 다윗이 요나단에게 이르되 내일은 초하루인즉 내가 마땅히 왕을 모시고 앉아 식사를 하여야 할 것이나 나를 보내어 셋째 날 저녁까지 들에 숨게 하고

sentences.original_text: tomorrow is the New Moon feast
and I am supposed to dine with the king
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 나는 왕과 함께 식사해야 합니다

sentences.original_text: but let me go and hide in the field
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 제가 가서 들에 숨게 해주세요

sentences.original_text: until the evening of the day after tomorrow
